      • createPluginPlaceholder

        Plugin createPluginPlaceholder(String simpleName,
                             String type,
                             String description)
        Creates a placeholder plugin and adds it to the list of added plugins. This plugin is just a mock object to inform the user that an object with complete features is expected here. It can be used for example to list a fake plugin that informs the user the real plugin cannot be added.
        Parameters:
        simpleName -
        type -
        description -
        Returns:
